attributes.action: Charge people for incorrect use of the 999 system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charge people for calling of ambulances unecessarily at the decison of treating doctor/paramedic. evan if patient is u/e take it direct from there benefits. There may be the need for a disclamer for the elderly or registered invalids these people who get a orange disk for there car etc.
